column3:
ハイラル王家秘蔵の歴史的価値の高い衣装が
ラムダという盗賊に奪われていた
そのうちの１つは僭王の兜 と呼ばれている

その隠し場所を記した手記が
アデヤ村跡のどこかにあるらしい
column4:
The royal family of Hyrule collected historically
significant outfits, but they were stolen by a
bandit named Misko. One of the items stolen
was the helmet of the Usurper King.

Somewhere in theDeya Village Ruins
is a journal that places the location
of this treasure...

column3:
『影の王を僭称せし者の兜は
双子山の南に潜む枯れ木谷の沼に』

ビトゥオ谷に隠された宝箱の中から
ザントの兜を手に入れた！
column4:
\"The helm of the self-proclaimed King of
Shadows is in the swamp of the valley
of dead trees, south of Dueling Peaks.\"

You found the treasure that was hidden at
Tobio's Hollow and obtainedZant's Helmet!

column3: Ｅｘ ラムダの秘宝 僭王の兜

『影の王を僭称せし者の兜は
双子山の南に潜む枯れ木谷の沼に』

ラムダの手記Ex2に僭王の兜を
隠した場所が記されていた
双子山の南に潜む枯れ木谷の沼 とは…？
column4:
\"The helm of the self-proclaimed King of
Shadows isin the swamp of the valley
of dead trees, south of Dueling Peaks.\"

Misko's EX Journal 2 notes where the Usurper
King's Helmet is hidden...but where could it
be talking about?
